mapper.select: select ps.*, m.id as m_id,m.match_id,m.season_year, t.id as t_id,t.team_id,t.name as team_name from basketball_player_stats ps inner join basketball_matches m on m.match_id=ps.match_id inner join basketball_teams t on t.team_id=ps.team_id where ps.id=#{id}

select ps.*, m.id as m_id,m.match_id,m.season_year t.id as t_id,t.team_id,t.name as team_name from basketball_player_stats ps inner join basketball_matches m on m.match_id=ps.match_id inner join basketball_teams t on t.team_id=ps.team_id where ps.player_id=#{playerId} and ps.match_id=#{matchId}
mapper.insert:
select sq_playerstats.nextval from dual
insert into basketball_player_stats (id,created_on,modified_on,match_id,player_id,team_id,fieldgoals,fieldgoal_attempts,fieldgoal_percentage,threepoint_fg,threepoint_fg_attempts,threepoint_fg_percentage,freethrows,freethrow_attempts,freethrow_percentage,offensive_rebounds,defensive_rebounds,total_rebounds,assists,steals,blocks,turnovers,personal_fouls,points) values (#{id},current_timestamp,current_timestamp,#{match.matchId},#{player.playerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{team.teamId},#{fieldGoals},#{fieldGoalAttempts},#{fieldGoalPercentage},#{threePointFG},#{threePointFGAttempts},#{threePointFGPercentage},#{freeThrows},#{freeThrowAttempts},#{freeThrowPercentage},#{offensiveRebounds},#{defensiveRebounds},#{totalRebounds},#{assists},#{steals},#{blocks},#{turnovers},#{personalFouls},#{points})
mapper.update: UPDATE basketball_player_stats set team_id=#{team.teamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, match_id=#{match.matchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, player_id=#{player.playerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_on=current_timestamp, points=#{points} where player_id=#{player.playerId} and match_id=#{match.matchId}
